title: Double Spear of Shjoin Pyke needs to be nerfed.
body:
Just that. It's absolutely BS.

Ether make it so you can't stack items, or make it so you can't be permanently stunned for the whole fight or make it so that the AI doesn't CONSTANTLY WALK INTO IT.

replies.body: It's important to keep the blame where it lies: Pyke, not spear.  I think the biggest issue is the width, length, and duration of the Pyke's stun.  He's a tier 2 champion with an ult that's fit for tier 5.  If they either shortened the distance (like WHY does he go 10 hexes???) to something like 2 hexes, or the duration to 1/1.5/2 seconds, then it'd be at least understandable.
Even if they move out of it, they're still stunned if they were in the path... learned it the hard way in a clutch match >.>

> [{quoted}](name=Dewott610,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=qXUvAaLK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-07-09T22:08:39.321+0000)
>
> stacking needs to go, {{champion:236}} was just running everywhere  with {{item:3161}} {{item:3161}} {{item:3094}}  to where my team literally couldn't attack him

While I agree that stacking needs to go, spear of shojin stacking on low mana champions is garbage and a waste of spear of shojin. 

Spear of shojin regens 15% of your mana per auto after your first cast of ability. But Lucian has 35 max mana. That means two will regain him an extra 10.5 mana per auto attack. Sounds great but let’s math it out. He is gaining 20.5 mana per auto so he hits max mana in 2 autos as opposed to 4, pretty scary. Hmm, wonder how it would go if he got a single seraph’s instead. Seraph’s restores 20 mana on spell cast, hmmm, wait a second, that means it only takes 2 autos because he only needs 15 more mana. Actually hmm wait a second times 2, because if he crits, that gives 15 mana instead of 10, making him only require a single auto (the crit only increases base mana regen so shojin build would still need 2 autos even if he crit).

What makes double shojin op is it makes champions with 150 mana take only 3 autos to cast their spell. Triple shojin makes 150 mana units cast their spell again after 2 autos. 

TL;DR low mana units benefit more off seraph’s and high mana cost units benefit more off seraph’s. Don’t want your shojin’s on lucian/akali/yasuo guys!
Pyke needs to be nerfed, AND same items shouldn't stack.

ive seen a guy build {{item:3124}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3124}} {{champion:136}} and just stack random tanky units infront of him to buy time for the items to build up.

needless to say it was stupid and unbeatable.

so +1 to the notion that the same items shouldnt stack.

i can deal with glacials, i can deal with literally anything except a pyke because he is so over clocked on dmg and stun duration and being able to use his move every 3 auto attacks is just beyond sensiblity. Riot please nerf him to the ground and have him be a balanced champ. makes the game unplayable. zero counter play unless you get everyone with pd and dragons tooth (ps not likely)
I think is already nerfed in the PBE.

Pyke and shojin both got nerfed, also morello, which was an item perfect for pyke.

Pyke can carry half a fight if you give him 3 Items as of now.
So does Draven, so does Seju, so does Swain, so does MF, so does Akali and so on.

Items in this game on the right champions are gamechangers and a Pyke without Items does not do a lot.
He is only usefull with Items, he's just another peasant without them, will probably use his ability a single time before he dies and does not change the game with it.

Draven, Seju, Swain and MF are usefull WITHOUT ITEMS.(level 4 and 5 units) That's the difference.

However it can still be argued that his ability has too much impact for a level 2 unit compared to other level 2 units.

instead of nerfing double spear of shojin  how about we just limit 1 of any item on any character in TFT so no doubles or triples of any single item on a single character. I made a thread about it but no one liked it so they would rather have the items or champions nerfed.
